verses.verse: וָאָשֻׁ֗ב <S%H7725><s%> va-'a-Shuv, And I turned וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa and lifted up עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָֽאֶרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> va-'er-'Eh, and looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four מַרְכָּבוֹת֙ <S%H4818><s%> mar-ka-Vot chariots יֹֽצְא֔וֹת <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'ot, out מִבֵּ֖ין <S%H996><s%> mib-Bein between שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei from between two הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim; mountains וְהֶהָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> ve-he-ha-Rim and the mountains הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei [were] mountains נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. of brass

בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <S%H4818><s%> bam-mer-ka-Vah chariot הָרִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-sho-Nah In the first סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses אֲדֻמִּ֑ים <S%H122><s%> 'a-dum-Mim; [were] red וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <S%H4818><s%> u-vam-mer-ka-Vah chariot הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit and in the second סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses שְׁחֹרִֽים׃ <S%H7838><s%> she-cho-Rim. black

וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָ֥ה <S%H4818><s%> u-vam-mer-ka-Vah chariot הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shit And in the third סוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses לְבָנִ֑ים <S%H3836><s%> le-va-Nim; white וּבַמֶּרְכָּבָה֙ <S%H4818><s%> u-vam-mer-ka-Vah chariot הָרְבִעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'It, and in the fourth סוּסִ֥ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim horses בְּרֻדִּ֖ים <S%H1261><s%> be-rud-Dim grisled אֲמֻצִּֽים׃ <S%H554><s%> 'a-mutz-Tzim. and bay

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <S%H6030><s%> va-'A-'an Then I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar, and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach unto the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> had-do-Ver that talked בִּ֑י Bi; מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni. master

וַיַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'Ach And the angel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh, These אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' unto me These [are] the four רֻח֣וֹת <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chot spirits הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of the heavens יוֹצְא֕וֹת <S%H3318><s%> yotz-'ot which go forth מֵֽהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <S%H3320><s%> me-hit-yatz-Tzev from standing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- before אֲד֥וֹן <S%H113><s%> a-Don before the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of all the earth

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of which בָּ֞הּ bah הַסּוּסִ֣ים <S%H5483><s%> has-su-Sim horses הַשְּׁחֹרִ֗ים <S%H7838><s%> hash-she-cho-Rim, The black יֹֽצְאִים֙ <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Im which [are] therein go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz country צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon, into the north וְהַלְּבָנִ֔ים <S%H3836><s%> ve-hal-le-va-Nim, and the white יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after וְהַ֨בְּרֻדִּ֔ים <S%H1261><s%> ve-Hab-be-rud-Dim, them and the grisled יָצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U go forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz country הַתֵּימָֽן׃ <S%H8486><s%> hat-tei-Man. toward the south

וְהָאֲמֻצִּ֣ים <S%H554><s%> ve-ha-'a-mutz-Tzim And the bay יָצְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U, went forth וַיְבַקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H1245><s%> vay-vak-Shu and sought לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet that they might walk to and fro לְהִתְהַלֵּ֣ך <S%H1980><s%> le-hit-hal-Lech walk to and fro בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, through the earth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu So they walked to and fro הִתְהַלְּכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> hit-hal-le-Chu patrol בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz; through the earth וַתִּתְהַלַּ֖כְנָה <S%H1980><s%> vat-tit-hal-Lach-nah patrolled בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. through the earth

וַיַּזְעֵ֣ק <S%H2199><s%> vai-yaz-'Ek Then cried אֹתִ֔י <S%H854><s%> 'o-Ti, to me וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber me and spake אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; unto me saying רְאֵ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh, Behold הַיּֽוֹצְאִים֙ <S%H3318><s%> hai-yotz-'Im these that go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz country צָפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon, toward the north הֵנִ֥יחוּ <S%H5117><s%> he-Ni-chu have quieted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- he upon רוּחִ֖י <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chi my spirit בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz country צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon. in the north ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

לָק֙וֹחַ֙ <S%H3947><s%> la-Ko-ach Take מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah, of [them of] the captivity מֵחֶלְדַּ֕י <S%H2469><s%> me-chel-Dai [even] of Heldai וּמֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> u-me-'Et טוֹבִיָּ֖ה <S%H2900><s%> toi-Yah of Tobijah וּמֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> u-me-'Et יְדַֽעְיָ֑ה <S%H3048><s%> ye-da'-Yah; and of Jedaiah וּבָאתָ֤ <S%H935><s%> u-va-Ta which are come אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom thou the same day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, the same וּבָ֗אתָ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta, and come בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house יֹאשִׁיָּ֣ה <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Yah of Josiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son צְפַנְיָ֔ה <S%H6846><s%> tze-fan-Yah, of Zephaniah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u and go מִבָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> mib-ba-Vel. from Babylon

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta Then take כֶֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> che-sef- silver וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav and gold וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and make עֲטָר֑וֹת <S%H5850><s%> a-ta-Rot; crowns וְשַׂמְתָּ֗ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta, and set בְּרֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh [them] upon the head יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' of Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָ֖ק <S%H3087><s%> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol. the high

וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And speak אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto him saying כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Behold the man צֶ֤מַח <S%H6780><s%> Tze-mach [is] The BRANCH שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo whose name וּמִתַּחְתָּ֣יו <S%H8478><s%> u-mit-tach-Tav where יִצְמָ֔ח <S%H6779><s%> yitz-Mach, and he shall grow up וּבָנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Nah out of his place and he shall build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> Ve-hu who יִבְנֶ֞ה <S%H1129><s%> yiv-Neh Even he shall build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הֵיכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal the temple יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- who יִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa and he shall bear ה֔וֹד <S%H1935><s%> Hod, the glory וְיָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-Shav and shall sit וּמָשַׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> u-ma-Shal and rule עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כִּסְא֑וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O; upon his throne וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will be a כֹהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> cho-Hen and he shall be a priest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כִּסְא֔וֹ <S%H3678><s%> kis-'O, upon his throne וַעֲצַ֣ת <S%H6098><s%> va-'a-Tzat and the counsel שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom, of peace תִּהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein will be between שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem. shall be between them both

וְהָעֲטָרֹ֗ת <S%H5850><s%> ve-ha-'a-ta-Rot, And the crowns תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh will become לְחֵ֙לֶם֙ <S%H2494><s%> le-Che-lem shall be to Helem וּלְטוֹבִיָּ֣ה <S%H2900><s%> u-le-toi-Yah and to Tobijah וְלִידַֽעְיָ֔ה <S%H3048><s%> ve-li-da'-Yah, and to Jedaiah וּלְחֵ֖ן <S%H2581><s%> u-le-Chen and to Hen בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צְפַנְיָ֑ה <S%H6846><s%> tze-fan-Yah; of Zephaniah לְזִכָּר֖וֹן <S%H2146><s%> le-zik-ka-Ron for a memorial בְּהֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> be-hei-Chal in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וּרְחוֹקִ֣ים׀ <S%H7350><s%> u-re-cho-Kim And they [that are] far off יָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u, shall come וּבָנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Nu and build בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> be-hei-Chal in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cha-ni hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; to וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will take אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Mo-a' me unto you And [this] shall come to pass if ye will diligently תִּשְׁמְע֔וּן <S%H8085><s%> tish-me-'Un, obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God ס sa-Mek
